subject: United States Defense and Military Forces
Football
Iraq War (2003- )
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. players Josh Wilson, Sammy Morris and Willie Roaf joined cheerleaders from the Oakland Raiders on a ten-day good-will tour in Iraq.
snippet: The N.F.L. players Josh Wilson, Sammy Morris and Willie Roaf joined cheerleaders from the Oakland Raiders on a ten-day good-will tour in Iraq.
